EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #8.2019 Dealer Update #8
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - February 25, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | February 2019
Promotional Pricing for TCAS Upgrades
- This sales bulletin provides our authorized dealers a discounted pricing offer to upgrade their customer’s aircraft with Honeywell’s Traffic Collision and Avoidance Systems. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-27 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-27 CAS-100_TCAS_II_Sales_Promotion.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Trade-in Program for Primus 660/880 Weather Radar
- This bulletin announces a Trade-In offer to any Operator that purchases either a Primus 880 or Primus 660 Weather Radar to replace their existing Honeywell manufactured weather radar. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-28 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-28 Primus 660_880 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Enhanced Ground Proximity Warning System Exchange Program
- The purpose of this Sales Bulletin is to provide special pricing and exchange terms for Honeywell Avionics Dealers/Channel Partners servicing BGA Operators of VVIP air transport category aircraft with Honeywell Enhanced Ground Proximity Warning System (EGPWS) MKV units (installed or spares) to upgrade to the latest configuration MKV-A Unit. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-29 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-29 EGPWS MKV to MKV-A Exchange Promotional Pricing SRG.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
